Description: As Channel 7 new producer Hugo Talley schemes to boost ratings, his team inadvertently lands a huge story, but an untimely Botox disaster for aging anchorwoman Gilda Braun and the personal convictions of a new assistant, Hayden Hazard, threaten to crush Hugo's dreams of news stardom.
